description: Mentioned only by Irwin, who describes it as �small metal bars, single stroke�. He refers to a tuned percussion stop in which the bars are struck by hammers, actuated by an electrical or pneumatic mechanism. The French word means �bells�. It is not clear how this stop differs from the Glockenspiel.
examplesDescription: All known examples are listed below.

examples.name: Cloches, Solo; Basilica del Santisimo Sacramento, Buenos Aires, Argentina; Mutin-Cavaillé-Coll 1912.
